item.title: Social Media Content Manager / Strategist - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for someone to assist with our social media engagement and creative process for our own companies and clients.
Our need is for consistent engagement and creating posts as well as working closely with the team to develop posts, reels and stories for 3+ posts a day using a scheduler on several platforms.

I don't want cookie-cutter approach but a solution to being active on social in our clients voice, being authentic and we also have a system with AI that we can train to support in content development. The system we use is straight forward, clean, stand out.

If you are a video editor for YouTube and Social Reels also, even better. We are seeking one of those too.

Hourly Range: $7.00-$15.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 20:03 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Optimization
Skills: Social Media Optimization
Country: United States

item.title: [Portuguese] SMM/UGC creator with a CUTE CAT o video-review our iOS app - Upwork
item.description:
Needs to hire 3 Freelancers
Hi! We are the AI Boost team.

Our IOS app allows you to create images with your appearance using artificial intelligence.
Now we are looking for people who can record and edit a short UGC video about about creating images with AI in our application (we will provide a rough text). Important: while reading out the text you need to hold a cute cat in your arms) You can pet him, a little bit of confusion because he distracts you. The funnier your cat and the video, the better:)

We want you to record a vibrant and dynamic video in Portuguese (Brazil) in TikTok style. Reference: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1KqYIfUMh5enJBqfR8Brtu1rplTFUJn-u/view

You will need:
▪️ Make a short 20-25 second video about our app with subtitles and attach the footage used to the archive (edited and source of video)
▪️ Size: 9:16 (1080x1920)
▪️ Attach 7-10 good quality selfies
▪️  Record a 10-15 second video of yourself looking into the camera and showing enthusiastic emotion
Here is an example of what we're looking for: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dnDMXxEa3W-y1KNLcNCyxmYi1slHVOaP/view

More details will be shared with the selected candidates

Budget: $37
Posted On: July 01, 2024 19:48 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:TikTok Video, Instagram Reels, YouTube Video, iOS, Acting, Voice Acting
Skills: TikTok Video, Instagram Reels, YouTube Video, iOS, Acting, Voice Acting
Country: Cyprus
click to apply

item.title: Create two explainer videos for our nonprofit - Upwork
item.description:
I would like to create two explainer videos for our nonprofit here in Oregon. We focus on homesharing as a solution to the affordable housing crisis. We match homeowners with renters and we have some steps to how our process works and who we are, which would be the first video. The second video would be some "Commonly Asked Questions about Homesharing". I can provide scripts for both to work with. I need some help explaining who we are as an organization, and I think your skills will bring that to life. This is short term work, but there is definitely room in the future to create more videos with you to continue the same look and feel in the future.

Our website is HomeShare Oregon - https://www.homeshareoregon.org/

Budget: $200
Posted On: July 01, 2024 19:55 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Explainer Video
Skills: Explainer Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Need a Social Media Manager & YouTube Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a dynamic and creative individual to join our team as a Social Media Manager and YouTube Specialist. This role will be pivotal in enhancing our online presence across various social media platforms and optimizing our YouTube channel to maximize engagement and growth.

*Responsibilities:*
1. *Social Media Management:*
   - Develop and implement comprehensive social media strategies to increase brand awareness and drive traffic to our platforms.
   - Create engaging content (including text, image, and video) tailored to each platform's audience and best practices.
   - Monitor and respond to comments, messages, and inquiries across social media channels promptly and professionally.
   - Analyze social media insights and metrics to adjust strategies and improve performance continually.

2. *YouTube Channel Optimization:*
   - Manage and grow our YouTube channel, focusing on increasing subscribers, views, and engagement.
   - Plan, produce, and edit compelling video content consistent with our brand identity and target audience.
   - Optimize videos with titles, descriptions, tags, and thumbnails to improve discoverability and viewer retention.
   - Stay updated on YouTube algorithm changes and best practices to ensure maximum visibility and effectiveness.

3. *Collaboration and Reporting:*
   - Coordinate with internal teams (such as marketing, content creators, and designers) to align social media and YouTube strategies with overall marketing goals.
   - Provide regular reports on social media and YouTube performance, including key metrics, trends, and actionable insights.
   - Stay informed about industry trends, competitor activities, and emerging platforms to recommend innovative strategies.

*Qualifications:*
- Proven experience as a Social Media Manager or similar role, with a track record of managing successful social media campaigns.
- In-depth knowledge of social media platforms, their respective audiences, and best practices.
- Proficiency in video editing software and experience in producing high-quality video content for YouTube.
- Strong analytical skills to interpret data and translate insights into actionable strategies.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively across teams.
- Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities to adapt strategies in a fast-paced environment.

*Preferred Skills:*
- Familiarity with SEO principles and practices for YouTube and social media.
- Experience with paid social media advertising and campaign management.
- Graphic design skills and proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator).

*Benefits:*
- Competitive salary commensurate with experience.
- Opportunities for professional growth and development.
- Flexible work hours and remote work options.
- Comprehensive benefits package including health insurance and retirement plans.

Join us in shaping our digital presence and engaging with our global audience through innovative social media and YouTube strategies. If you are passionate about digital marketing, creative content creation, and driving impactful results, we encourage you to apply and become part of our dynamic team!


Hourly Range: $5.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 19:54 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Instagram, Facebook, YouTube Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Content
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Instagram, Facebook, YouTube Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Content
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Deutscher Video Cutter gesucht! - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,

wir suchen einen Video Cutter der folgende Kriterien erfüllt:

Du solltest Videos auf Premium Niveau schneiden, sodass diese einfach besser und spannender mitzuverfolgen sind als der Großteil der Videos auf dem Markt. Beispiel: Einblendungen, Animationen, Grafiken, Captions und dabei selbst kreativ mitdenken und auf eigene Ideen kommen.
Du solltest Deutsch sprechen und verstehen können, damit Du unsere Videos schneiden kannst.
Du solltest Dich an Deadlines halten und eine gute Kommunikation für eine angenehme Zusammenarbeit anstreben.

Hourly Range: $18.00-$50.00

item.description:
YouTube Thumbnail Editor for Weekly / Biweekly videos in the women's fashion genre.

- Raw Photo Selector; take our raw photo folder from Dropbox and suggest the final set to proceed for editing/retouching

- Able to show and articulate what you think makes a good Youtube Thumbnail
- Uses the Youtube Thumbnail tester

- Experience in photography / wordpress / html is also an asset

item.title: Video Editor for Travel Agency Commercial Ad - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to edit a commercial ad for our travel agency. The ad will be used for promoting our services on various digital platforms. The ideal candidate should have experience in creating captivating and engaging videos that effectively communicate our brand message.

    Responsibilities:
    - Review raw footage and select the best clips
    - Trim and rearrange footage to create a cohesive storyline
    - Enhance video quality with color correction and audio editing
    - Add visual effects, text overlays, and transitions
    - Ensure the video adheres to our brand guidelines and overall vision

    Requirements:
    - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
    - Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
    - Understanding of storytelling techniques and visual composition
    - Experience working on commercial ads or promotional videos
    - Knowledge of travel industry trends and aesthetics

    If you are a creative video editor with a passion for travel and can bring our brand to life through compelling visuals, we would love to hear from you. Show us your portfolio showcasing relevant work and share why you are the perfect fit for this project.

Budget: $70
Posted On: July 01, 2024 19:48 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: [Video Editing] Talented *Premiere Pro* Editor Needed!! - Upwork
item.description:
OVERVIEW:
I'm looking for a super-talented Premiere Pro editor to create 3 TikTok/IG Reels. Each video will be 60-90 seconds and need to be formatted for Social Media. The editing needs to be punchy, engaging, eye-catching so it stands out in the Feed.

Editing Examples:
https://www.instagram.com/p/CZIHaBCgtHF/
https://www.instagram.com/p/CZrFqQNjM9t/
https://www.instagram.com/p/CSwe4bJHtS2/

Note: I'm hoping to find an amazing freelancer that I can call on for future projects! This project should be a good trial run 🙂

MY BACKGROUND:
I'm a social media influencer with 1 Million followers and 100 Million views. I've worked with Sylvester Stallone, Logan Paul, The Ellen Show, Warner Brothers, and more.

JOB TASKS:
1. Edit Footage - I have footage that needs to be seamlessly edited together into 60-90 second videos.
2. Re-Format for TikTok/Reels - Adjust Scale and Center the clips to fit Vertical Video (1080px×1920px).
3. Custom Captions/Subtitles - Make Custom Subtitles that are stylized for TikTok/Reels. Use motion graphics, Captions app, Subly, or other software.
4. Effects/Transitions - Make sure the first 15-20 seconds are attention-grabbing! Add relevant Effects and Transitions throughout to keep viewers engaged.
5. Color Correction/Grading - Polish off the video with any color correction or LUTs to make the footage pop!
6. B-Roll / Animations - I want this video to be engaging all the way through. Any cool editing tricks that can be used to tastefully incorporate B-Roll / Animation is great.
7. Send Premiere Pro File - It's important that I receive the project files so I can make any final edits!

REQUIREMENTS:
- Outstanding video editing skills in Adobe Suite (Premiere Pro, After Effects, etc).
- Must have A+ decision-making skills to identify ways to make the video engaging and primed for virality
- Ability to produce attention-grabbing Social Media Content and willingness to try new techniques that keep the viewer's attention!
- In-depth knowledge of all aspects of the editing process (B-Roll, Effects, Transitions, Color Grading, Music, etc).
- Must provide Competitive Rates! Other top editors have charged $25-$40/video for short-form TikTok & IG Reels content in the past.

Budget: $200
Posted On: July 01, 2024 19:45 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, TikTok Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Animation
Skills: Instagram Reels, TikTok Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Animation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: 3d animator required for youtube channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a 3d animator who has experience in designing videos like this sample channel https://www.youtube.com/@fern-tv/videos

you will be responsible for editing, copyright free music and final production of these videos. An eleven labs voiceover would be beneficial also.

The scripts will be supplied to you alongside basic requirements of where to put specific segments etc.

you will have to have sufficient evidence of your being able to produce such videos of high quality.

please send thru your portfolio of relevant experience.

all experience needs to be dated within the last year. if any samples are dated on todays date they will not be considered.

we need a great communicator with great English skills and great organization skills.

you must have sufficient experience and not be a beginner.

please start your proposal with the word 'ZEBRA' to be considered.

Budget: $100
Posted On: July 01, 2024 19:30 UTC
Category: 3D Animation
Skills:3D Animation, Character Design, Animation, Motion Graphics
Skills: 3D Animation, Character Design, Animation, Motion Graphics

item.title: Creative Ads Specialist - Static + Video for Facebook - Upwork
item.description:
Hi!

We've been selling wine online for 15+ years and I'm looking for someone to help with our creative advertising.

Specifically, I need someone who can help us churn out static and video creatives.

I have a figma file with 250+ pre made templates. We use Foreplay.co to save many other ad ideas. I've been making ads myself for years and will work closely with you on ideation and direction.

I'm looking for a lot of static ads, along with some video work. We have many customer testimonials for example, and lots of other video creative already. I'd like someone who can do mashups of our existing assets and perhaps help with overall direction/briefs for new concepts.

Hourly Range: $34.00-$90.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 19:22 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Advertising Design, Food & Beverage, Figma, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Creative Strategy
Skills: Advertising Design, Food & Beverage, Figma, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Creative Strategy
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: UGC Content Creator for Jewellery Brand - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a range of UGC Content Creators for a start-up jewellery brand.

About the role:
We require each UGC creator to make at least two videos (one organic, one ad friendly) showing off the pieces we send. The brief for the videos may vary from:

- Video testimonial
- Styling video
- Product unboxing
- ASMR style video
- Product showcase

The ideal candidate will:
- Have previous experience as a social media UGC content creator
- Have a good understanding of the various social media channels and their algorithms including Instagram, TikTok, Facebook etc
- Confidence to be both behind and in front of the camera (some briefs will require you to show your face on camera)
-  Strong video editing skills, specifically editing videos for social media
- Ability to work from a script when required
- Previous experience working to a brief (however we also appreciate your creative input)

If this sounds like a role you could be interested in, please send over your portfolio and/or links to any previous work to farlie.jewellery@gmail.com


Budget: $30
Posted On: July 01, 2024 19:21 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Testimonial Video, Video Commercial, Demo Video, Content Writing, Social Media Marketing, Instagram
Skills: Testimonial Video, Video Commercial, Demo Video, Content Writing, Social Media Marketing, Instagram
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.description:
Hello, I run a video marketing/advertising agency and am looking for a remote video producer to help us with advertising campaign planning and production.

In this role, you will do research on the client and objectives to help the production team plan and produce video ads to help the client achieve the desired results.

item.title: 3D animator required for simple videos. Must work fast! - Upwork
item.description:
Hi Applicants,

RE: Skilled 3D Animator Needed for Children's Educational Music Video

We're seeking a talented 3D animator to bring our children's educational music videos to life. This project will be ongoing, depending on your cost and the turnaround time of each deliverable.

Key Requirements:
- Proven experience in 3D animation, particularly in a style suitable for young children
- Proficiency in 3D animation workflows
- Strong understanding of movement, timing, and character expression
- Ability to create engaging, colorful environments
- Experience with lip-syncing for singing characters is a plus
- Familiarity with rendering and basic compositing

Project Details:
- Duration: Approximately 3-5 minute videos
- Style: Bright, cheerful, and child-friendly 3D animation
- Characters: Various Characters
- Scenes: Will vary based on each request

Deliverables:
- Fully animated 3D video synced to audio track
- High-quality rendered output suitable for YouTube (1080p minimum, 4K preferred, 16:9)

Please include your portfolio showcasing relevant work, particularly any projects aimed at young children. We're looking for someone who can capture the fun, educational spirit of our songs and create visuals that will engage and delight young viewers.

Ideal candidates will have excellent communication skills and be able to work collaboratively with our team to bring this vision to life. We're excited to see your creative interpretations of our musical journey!

Best,
Andy


Posted On: July 01, 2024 19:17 UTC
Category: 3D Animation
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Animation, 3D Animation, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Character Design, Graphic Design, 2D Animation
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Animation, 3D Animation, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Character Design, Graphic Design, 2D Animation
Country: Jamaica
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Manager - Upwork
item.description:
The Social Media Liaison plays a crucial role in coordinating and managing social media content creation and distribution for the ECOM Family Academy. This role involves collaborating with various teams, including video editors, admin staff, gatekeepers, and Coach Reggie to ensure a cohesive and effective social media strategy that aligns with the academy's objectives.

Goal of the Social Media Liaison

The primary goal of the Social Media Liaison is to enhance the online presence of the ECOM Family Academy, increase engagement with the target audience, and drive conversions through strategic content planning and execution. By leveraging various social media platforms and optimizing content strategies, the Social Media Liaison aims to strengthen brand awareness, foster community engagement, and ultimately contribute to the growth and success of the academy.


Hourly Range: $8.00-$25.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 19:11 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:TikTok, YouTube, Influencer Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram, Social Media Management, Facebook, Content Writing, Social Media Content, Social Media Marketing
Skills: TikTok, YouTube, Influencer Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram, Social Media Management, Facebook, Content Writing, Social Media Content, Social Media Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply
